QuestData.Title: Finding the Survivors
QuestData.Description: If I know anything about ogres, it's that they like their food fresh. This means that the Mag'har that they captured are more than likely being kept alive until they are ready to serve. It's a sickening thought, I know, but one that we must use to our advantage.$B$BVenture to Warmaul Hill and search for Mag'har prisoners. If you find prisoners, then you will find keys to their cages on the nearby Warmaul ogres.$B$BKill ogres for their keys and release the prisoners.
QuestData.LogDescription: Elder Ungriz at the Mag'hari Procession in Nagrand has asked that you free 5 Mag'har Prisoners.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Ungriz sighs.>$B$BI know it's a lot to ask for, $N; but bring them back alive...
QuestData.RewardText: You have done what none thought was possible and brought back our missing brothers and sisters. You are a hero to the Mag'har, $N. All will know your name and the deeds that you have performed for us.
